snippet: In the video, the men, recently abducted from Baghdad, state their names and call on the Turkish president to fulfill the demands of their abductors.
abstract: Iraqi Shiite militia Death Squads make demands and threats to Turkish government in video showing over dozen Turkish construction workers kidnapped from Sadr City, Iraq, construction site.

byline.contributor: Ceylan Yeginsu contributed reporting from Istanbul

lead_paragraph: In the video, the men, recently abducted from Baghdad, state their names and call on the Turkish president to fulfill the demands of their abductors.

headline.main: Shiite Militia Releases Video of Turkish Workers Kidnapped in Iraq
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Middle East; Iraq:Militia Group Claims to Hold Turks

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
